Testimonial.Headline: Living Science Named Finalist for STEM Education Award
Testimonial.Description: During a live webcast, Living Science Home Studies was nominated as a finalist for a STEM education award, by the Technology Association of Georgia (TAG)
Testimonial.TestimonialText: ...we have started STEM in the Middle and High School and we need to promote that, Georgia needs the jobs and we have a good idea about the students that will fill them...

Testimonial.TestimonialText: ...I see a lot of young people that do not know the meaning of "Be still", everything in their lives is "hurry up"...

Testimonial.Headline: Discipleship#2 Mrs. D – Living Science Philosophy of Education
Testimonial.Description: Discipleship#2 Mrs. D – Living Science Philosophy of Education
Testimonial.TestimonialText: True education is leading someone from the known to the unknown in preparation for Life. If we do not prepare our young people for life, we have not educated them.” “Inside every child is a diamond. We and the parents must find the diamond and polish it so that young person can shine for Jesus.

Testimonial.Headline: Mrs. D. - Discipleship #3
Testimonial.Description: Devotions. We want our Servant Leaders to be ready to share what they have been reading in the Word at a moment’s notice. However our goal is to continually stop in the middle of teaching, and reference the Lord, His fingerprint, His greatness, His creativity, and thus draw the attention of the students to the Lord more than just once at the beginning of class.
Testimonial.TestimonialText: We want our Servant Leaders to be ready to share what they have been reading in the Word at a moment’s notice.
